metadata.title: HDR Supervision Arrangements Schedule 3 - Supervisor Professional Development

sections.section_title: HDR Supervision Arrangements Schedule 3 - Supervisor Professional Development

clauses.text: (1) Authority for this document is established by the HDR Supervision Arrangements Procedure. The requirements listed in this schedule are specific to maintaining eligibility as an HDR supervisor. Professional development requirements apply to internal supervisors only. Academic staff will have additional professional development requirements not listed here (e.g. research integrity and reconciliation capability). Refer to Workday Learning for registration and further information.
